title: Valhalla Fantasy Pack
description: The Valhalla Music Pack features twenty four fantasy-based instrumental tracks. Utilizing orchestral effects, all of the pieces within this asset pack are versatile enough to use across a wide variety of projects.
longDescription:
Music composer, Living Force is proud to present The Valhalla Fantasy Music Pack! This is an asset pack that contains twenty four orchestral instrumentals geared towards the world of fantasy. The pieces all contain a fade-out and are loopable for desired cut scenes, action sequences, and transitions for your projects.


A Heart Forged In Fire - A Minor - 120 - BPM

An Army Assembles - F Minor - 130 BPM

Beauty On The Lake - G Minor - 95 BPM

Chariot On The Way - C Minor - 150 BPM

Forbidden Paradise - C Minor - 70 BPM

Sweet Dream - Harp Flute Violin Double Bass - E Major - 90 BPM

The Fading Embers - E Minor - 95 BPM

The Aftermath Of Battle - Bb Minor - 75 BPM

The Battle Barge - F Minor - 150 BPM

The Castle Of Hope - E Major - 130 BPM

The Enchanted Island - D Minor - 100 BPM

The First Explorer - D Minor - 130 BPM

The Fleet Arrives - D Minor - 90 BPM

The Hand Of Honor - B Minor - 160 BPM

The High Rock View - F Minor - 60 - BPM

The Ice Of Bitfrost - F Minor - 120 BPM

The Journey Home - D Minor - 100 BPM

The Kingdom Rises - G Major 70 BPM

The Open Sea - A Minor 87 BPM

The Prelude To War - B Minor - 120 BPM

The Queen's Throne - Ab Minor - 130 BPM
